wikipedia_page.main: George Robert Adams (born 28 September 1947 in Shoreditch) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League as a midfielder.

response: * George Adams (1731–1789), British Whig politician and Staffordshire landowner

* George Adams (footballer, born 1950), Scottish football player and coach (director of football at Ross County)
